mapper.select: select u_userid,cap_licenseYN,cap_idYSN,cap_cancelreason,cap_requestTime,cap_manager From(select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by u_userid desc)rnum,u_userid,cap_licenseYN,cap_idYSN,cap_cancelreason,cap_requestTime,cap_manager from captain where cap_idysn='S' or cap_idysn='N') where rnum between ${param1} and ${param2} order by cap_requesttime desc
SELECT COUNT(u_userid) FROM captain where cap_idysn='S' or cap_idysn='N' order by cap_requesttime desc
SELECT L_name FROM license WHERE u_userid = #{u_userid} and rownum=1 order by L_name asc
